title: Fix Broken Internal Links
description: A technical SEO audit has found several broken internal links on the website that need to be fixed.

tasks.description: Get the list of broken links and the pages they are on from the SEO audit report.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has a clear list of URLs to fix.

tasks.description: For each broken link, find the correct new URL for the intended destination page.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the correct destination for each link.

tasks.description: Edit the source pages to update the broken links with the correct URLs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully fixes all the identified broken links.
